data.title: Cherokee County School District
data.text:
Superintendent of Schools Mary Elizabeth Davis opened the Cherokee County School Board meeting on Thursday by celebrating the start of new teachers, the return of administrative teams and the countdown to the first day of school.

Read More about Board Business Briefs: School Board Approves School Calendars

We greatly value the outstanding support staff in our schools and central office divisions, which is why we recognize them here. Please join us in congratulating the 2024 Support Staff Employee of the Year for Arnold Mill Elementary School: Alicia Perkins! #CCSDfam

Read More about Meet a CCSD 2024 Support Staff Employee of the Year: Alicia Perkins of Arnold Mill Elementary School!

The Cherokee County School District has earned a record number of national awards for excellence in communications and public relations.

Read More about CCSD Wins 2024 National Awards for Communications

Cherokee County School District leaders this week kicked off the new school year with the annual Superintendent’s Leadership Symposium professional development event.

Read More about CCSD Leaders Prepare for New School Year

Volunteers make a positive difference in our schools, which is why we spotlight them here ... congratulations to River Ridge High School 2024 Volunteer of the Year: Bruce Gates! #CCSDfam

Read More about Meet a CCSD 2024 Volunteer of the Year: Bruce Gates of River Ridge High School!

This summer, we converted our student information system and launched a new platform called Synergy in preparation for the 2024-25 school year. Synergy offers families a ParentVUE website and app that provides greater access to their children’s emergency contacts and attendance information.

Read More about CCSD ParentVUE and Schedules Update
